CustomField.formula: IF(Status__c='New', TEXT( FLOOR((Parent_Case__r.StatusNewInMinutes__c/1440)) ) & " Days / " & TEXT( FLOOR((Parent_Case__r.StatusNewInMinutes__c)/60)) &" Hours / " & TEXT( ROUND(MOD((Parent_Case__r.StatusNewInMinutes__c),60),2 ) ) &" Minutes ", ' ')
CustomField.label: Duration in New
